channel.title: Blogs on Ahmed Gaper
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Ahmed Gaper

item.title: GSoC '25 with Accord : Designing and Building Concerto Linter
item.author: ahmedgaper251@gmail.com (Ahmed Gaper)
item.description: An overview of my GSoC'25 project, written to be generic (not specific to the Accord team), covering the structural challenges, the Concerto linter’s workflow, how to build the tool, and how to design and ship a production-ready ruleset.

item.title: My GSoC Win
item.author: ahmedgaper251@gmail.com (Ahmed Gaper)
item.description: A story-like recap of my GSoC journey, encouraging anyone to take on the experience (or retry it), without rehashing the application process details that are already covered elsewhere. I’ve gathered every source and tool that helped me, starting from the very basics of what GSoC is, focusing on the things I didn’t find in other resources.
